main.intro: Full Stack Developer with preference to frontend and background in Industrial and UX/UI Design. Currently, I am a teacher in technical high schools, but I also have work experience in the productive industry and sales...

about.title: About Me
about.description1: Hello! My name is Matias Rodriguez and I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. My interest in web development started back in 2020, since the covid-19 pandemic, where I began to rethink my current job. I found in remote work and by objectives a way to enjoy the workday.
about.description2: Using my basic career, Industrial Design, and my training as a computer technician, as engines of the future project.
about.description3: I have been training for two years now, taking UX/UI courses, programming logic, web development bootcamps, and finally carrying out complete projects from the Back-End to the Front-End.
about.description4: Here are a few technologies I’ve been working with recently:

work1.position: Full-Stack Teaching Assistant Web Developer Fullstack
work1.description: Teaching Assistant (TA) for students at Henry Bootcamp
work1.task1: Coordinate a group of new joining students throughout the whole bootcamp experience
work1.task2: Guide students in the first steps of the course and clarify their doubts
work1.task3: Provide assistance in solving exercises and encourage group teamwork (Pair Programming).
work1.task4: Suggest ideas to improve the Bootcamp processes.
work1.task5: Promote collaboration and build community within the students
